title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.16 - Less expensive alternatives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.16 - Less expensive alternatives

State Regulations

Reimbursement for the cost of providing services may be the lesser of the actual costs incurred or those costs which could reasonably be anticipated if such services had been provided by the operation of joint central services or use of facilities or services which could have served effective alternatives or substitutes for the whole or any part of such service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-2.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
